title: First day as BUMMERS!!
someWords: Today marks the day our Guild is created. I would like to thank the pioneers. LET'S KILL SOME HORDES.

title: We did it guys!
someWords: We finally took that beach down(#($!

title: Some people have to go
someWords: As some of you have noticed, we have booted some players. They are Trump supporters, we cannot have dat. Sorry folks, if you are a Trump supporter, please leave or face the iron.

title: Utterly shocked
someWords: We have lost 60% of our guildies in just one day after yesterday's announcement. We are utterly shocked to know we have so many Trump supporters in our midst. If you have friends who are interested to join our Guild, pm me, but make sure they are not minions of Trump.

title: This game's looking good
someWords: Game's Genshin Impact, pretty hype game. Let's dive into that shite on release day.

title: OMG this game
someWords: Please play this before you die, or after. Highly recommend.

title: Dota 2 Tournament
someWords: We are forming a team to enter the tournament, interested please pm me or any of the Generals here. Losers get boot.

title: As you guys know
someWords: We are a very no Trump Guild. To demostrate that, we have organized a no Trump movement in Pennsylvania. Trip there in 5 days, people interested please pm me.

title: We have turned the tables
someWords: WE DID IT GUYS!!! WE WON!!
